stepTitle: Two piloted satellites approaching one another, at a relative speed of $$0.250$$ $$\frac{m}{s}$$, intending to dock. The first has a mass of $$4{10}^3$$ kg, and the second a mass of $$7.5{10}^3$$ kg. Calculate the final velocity (after docking) by using the frame of reference in which the first satellite was originally at rest.
